infos.value: You've certainly gotten better.
As have you. «Solidus» could make fine use of someone with your talents, Lady Machérie.
Oh, Schuzelt. You've been working on your flattery as well, I see?
Th-those two are...incredible.
Her talent is on par with the First Sword of «Solidus».
It would seem she is not simply some insufferable princess.
Something you'd like to say, King Oelde? Please speak freely.
Hah. You've made this warrior's blood run warm for the first time in an age.
Then we shall fight together... Look.
Their leader shows his face.
The one orchestrating this attack...
You'd best be on your guard, Lord Mont.
Lilyth...
Their leader no doubt will be more skilled than the rest.
Right.
Mont! To battle!
The time has come for the elder prince of Leonis to demonstrate his worth!
Y-yes, Father!
Well, well, well. It looks like you're really going to protect me from this rabble.
What is it? Has the cat got your tongue?
I'll protect you! I swear it!
Do you...desire me?
That's...
Or maybe...you simply want to keep the ancient relic of mine currently in your possession.
I-I've no interest in your ancient relic.
And I've no interest in weak men. If you want me, then prove your worth.
Before I forget about you completely!
